an5.89:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.89:1.3: Kammaramata, bhassaramata, niddaramata, sanganikaramata, yathavimuttam cittam na paccavekkhati—
an5.89:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.89:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti.
an5.89:2.3: Na kammaramata, na bhassaramata, na niddaramata, na sanganikaramata, yathavimuttam cittam paccavekkhati—
an5.89:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
